title: Help Small Countries Adopt Cardano
description: Can the Cardano community identify, research and promote valuable use-cases for 5 small ~100k underdeveloped, uniquely challenged countries?
importance: Cardano is criticised most for having few use cases. The IOG team can not find & promote every one. The community must engage its resources
success: Proposers identify use-cases for a specific country. Identify & contact decision-makers. Prepare and present a pitch and implementation plan
